name: Format\LinearGradientFill
description: The object for displaying a linear gradient as a component background.

properties.name: angle
properties.description: The angle of the gradient fill, in degrees. Use the angle to set the direction of the gradient. For example, a value of 180 defines a gradient that changes color from top to bottom. An angle of 90 defines a gradient that changes color from left to right.

properties.name: type
properties.description: This fill always has the type linear_gradient.
